channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sean Payton Has Second Thoughts on Passing Up FG in Broncos AFC Title Game Loss
item.description: Sean Payton admitted that he's second-guessing his decision to go for it on a key fourth down in the Broncos' three-point loss to the Patriots in the ...

item.title: Seahawks QB Sam Darnold 'Shut A Lot of People Up Tonight'
item.description: Seahawks QB Sam Darnold continued to rewrite his legacy, adding another chapter with his performance against the Rams on Sunday.

item.title: Can Seahawks Avenge Super Bowl XLIX Loss in Historic Rematch with Patriots?
item.description: The Seahawks and Patriots are set for a rematch of Super Bowl XLIX. What's in store?

item.title: Sound Smart: 5 Observations from NFL Championship Sunday
item.description: Breaking down the biggest talking points from the conference title games and why the Seahawks and the Patriots advanced to Super Bowl LX.

item.title: Rams QB Matthew Stafford Mum on Future; Sean McVay Upset With Retirement Question
item.description: Matthew Stafford didn't indicate what's next for him, but Sean McVay was incredulous on the question of his quarterback's future.

item.title: Darnold 'shut a lot of people up,' Macdonald says
item.description: Sam Darnold answered questions about his big-game ability resoundingly, leading the Seahawks to a win over the Rams in the NFC Championship Game on Su...

item.title: 'Disgusted' Stewart protests shooting with sign
item.description: Unrivaled co-founder and two-time WNBA MVP Breanna Stewart held up an "Abolish ICE" sign during player introductions at Unrivaled on Sunday afternoon.

item.title: Payton rues 4th-down call after stalling in snow
item.description: Broncos coach Sean Payton said he will find several "regrets'' in Sunday's AFC Championship Game loss to the Patriots, most notably when he passed up ...

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Man City eye Real Madrid's Alexander-Arnold
item.description: Real Madrid's Trent Alexander-Arnold is being targeted for a return to the Premier League with Manchester City. Transfer Talk has the latest.

item.title: Stafford mum on future as Rams left reeling in loss
item.description: Matthew Stafford declined to discuss if he'd be back next season after the Rams suffered a heartbreaking loss to the Seahawks in the NFC title game.
